metadata.description: In an attempt to travel to the glorious past when horror comics were the disdain of every god-fearing mother on the planet and every teenage boy wanted to get his Greedy little hands on one, we've assembled a collection of vintage horror comics from yesteryear to shock and terrify you into  sleepless nights and nerve shattering days as you peek around every corner and look into every dark closet making sure there are no monsters or ghouls waiting to get you! So sit back and enjoy a blast from the past!
metadata.name: Shocking Terror
